scripts.dev: bash -c 'function cleanup() { pkill -f "next" 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f "5454" 2>/dev/null || true; pkill -f "pr-tracker" 2>/dev/null || true; for port in $(lsof -ti:5454 2>/dev/null); do kill -9 $port 2>/dev/null || true; done; sleep 2; rm -rf .next node_modules/.cache .vercel 2>/dev/null || true; }; cleanup && cleanup && next dev -p 5454'
